mainEntity.name: What types of asbestos services does WHS provide?

acceptedAnswer.text: WHS offers asbestos surveys, bulk sampling, risk assessments, asbestos management plans, and clearance testing.
Asbestos testing is required prior to demolition, renovation, or when suspect materials are present in pre-1990 buildings.

mainEntity.name: What’s included in an asbestos management plan?

acceptedAnswer.text: Plans include material inventories, risk assessments, control recommendations, monitoring schedules, and regulatory documentation.

mainEntity.name: Who can benefit from WHS asbestos services?

acceptedAnswer.text: Schools, contractors, building owners, property managers, and government agencies across Alberta and BC.

mainEntity.name: Are WHS asbestos reports legally compliant?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes — WHS reports are CIH-led and meet Alberta OHS, WorkSafeBC, and CSA regulatory standards.
